model.name: Regular Denim Pants
model.disambiguatingDescription: These denim pants are given a bold graphic treatment with an allover Diamond Damier featuring subtle intermittent Louis Vuitton signatures. The indigo cotton denim is printed with a discharge technique . The pants have a regular fit with classic 5 pocket denim tailoring.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• 98% Cotton, 2% Elastane
  • Indigo
  • Regular Fit
  • Model wears a FR 30 size
  • Model measurements : chest 32’’ / 82 cm, height 6’’ / 183 cm
  • Made in France

panelInformations.title: product care
panelInformations.description:
• Gentle dry clean
  • Dry clean inside out in a net
  • Iron inside out protecting garment with a fabric in between
panelInformations.introduction: To preserve the quality of this garment, we recommend you to respect the care instructions :
